name: layout-engine-issue
description: showing an issue with single-spa layout engine

scripts.start: concurrently "cd packages/container && yarn start" "cd packages/navbar && yarn start --port 8500" "cd packages/view-react && yarn start --port 8501" "cd packages/view-svelte && yarn start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd packages/container && yarn build" "cd packages/navbar && yarn build" "cd packages/view-react && yarn build" "cd packages/view-svelte && yarn build"

author: Anders Nilsson
